title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Planning
body: Planning       Use these links to access our management documents:  Fort Frederica's Superintendent Compendium, 2014 (pdf)   Amendment to Compendium, Unmanned Aircraft, 2014 (pdf)  Fort Frederica's General Management Plan, 2002 (pdf)  Amendment to General Management Plan, 2006 (pdf)  Fort Frederica Fire Management Plan, 2004 (pdf)  Fire Management Plan, Appendices (pdf)  Long Range Interpretive Plan, 2007 (pdf)
